title: Phase 2B: OpenClaw extras tool providers (web-only)
description: Implement non-browser OpenClaw extra tool providers with dynamic loading, keep web-only channel scope, and preserve current core tool behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Provider framework stable; first extra provider shipped; live tests green; docs updated

title: Implement openclaw_sessions provider scaffold
description: Add dynamic provider openclaw_sessions with config gating, registration, and channel-aware loading for web.
acceptance_criteria: Provider visible only when enabled; no conflicts with core tools; channel gating tested

title: Implement sessions tools: sessions_list sessions_history sessions_send
description: Add concrete tool handlers under openclaw_sessions provider with structured envelopes and bounded outputs.
acceptance_criteria: All three tools callable; schema + happy/error paths covered

title: Add env-gated live tests for openclaw_sessions tools
description: Create live integration tests for sessions tools, matching existing HOMIE_LIVE_TESTS pattern.
acceptance_criteria: Tests skip cleanly when env unset; pass in configured env

title: Implement tool-output prompt window retention policy
description: Keep tool outputs in prompt context for last N turns only; preserve full outputs in storage for diagnostics.
acceptance_criteria: Context assembly respects N-turn window; no regression in thread replay

title: UI: render extra provider tool results in chat turns
description: Ensure chat turns render openclaw extra tool outputs/errors with same envelope style as existing tools.
acceptance_criteria: Sessions tool responses readable in UI; no polling regressions

title: Plan next extras: canvas nodes cron
description: Define implementation order, contracts, and test matrix for openclaw_canvas, openclaw_nodes, openclaw_cron providers.
acceptance_criteria: Plan captured in phase2 docs with dependencies and acceptance gates

title: Phase 3: React Native (Expo) app - chat-first parity
description: Build a cross-platform mobile app using latest Expo/React Native with equivalent chat experience to web first, then terminal support. Keep protocol parity with chat.* and terminal.* from gateway.
notes:
Decomposed 8di.2/3/5/6/8 into child tasks for subagent parallelism. Immediate lane starts: A=8di.2.1 scaffold, then B=8di.2.2 transport + C=8di.2.3 chat API in parallel, then D=8di.2.4 web migration and E=8di.2.5 mobile integration.
Decisions locked: shared package path src/apps/shared; RN live tests protocol-driven; web cleanup refactors tracked under 8di.2.4.*.

title: Bootstrap Expo app workspace under src/apps/mobile
description: Create new Expo app (latest stable SDK at implementation time), wire TypeScript, lint/typecheck, env handling, and gateway URL configuration. Add run scripts and developer docs.
notes: Implemented Expo SDK 54 app scaffold in src/apps/mobile with chat-first tabs, theme tokens, reduced-motion-aware screen animation, runtime gateway config, and mobile README. Validation: pnpm -C src/apps/mobile typecheck.
close_reason: Expo foundation complete: scaffold + chat-first shell + design token baseline + docs + typecheck pass.

title: Extract shared gateway/chat client package for web + mobile
description: Move protocol envelope, RPC client, event subscriptions, and chat API helpers into a shared TS package to avoid drift between web and mobile.
notes: Started shared extraction. Completed scaffold subtask; beginning transport/chat module extraction in parallel subagents.
close_reason: Shared package extraction complete: web migrated to shared transport/chat helpers, mobile integrated shared gateway/chat runtime with target OOBE and persisted target config.

title: Shared package scaffold + versioning strategy
description: Create shared TS package in src/apps/shared with build/test scripts, tsconfig, export map, and versioning strategy for web+mobile consumers.
close_reason: Created src/apps/shared scaffold with package.json export map, tsconfig build/typecheck pipeline, docs, and passing typecheck/build.

title: Extract WS transport + RPC envelope client
description: Move websocket transport, request/response envelope handling, pending request map, reconnect hooks into shared package.
close_reason: Extracted shared gateway transport/protocol into src/apps/shared (GatewayTransport, protocol envelopes, request map) with passing shared typecheck/build.

title: Extract chat API module + event subscription layer
description: Move chat methods (chat.*), event subscription helpers, and typed payload mapping into shared package.
close_reason: Extracted shared chat client/events/types into src/apps/shared and exported from package index; shared typecheck/build passing.

title: Migrate web to shared client without behavior regression
description: Swap web hook/client imports to shared package and confirm existing web behavior (streaming, approvals, tools, settings) is unchanged.
notes: Web now consumes @homie/shared transport in use-gateway and shared chat normalization/collaboration helpers in use-chat; web typecheck passes. Remaining cleanup: migrate remaining local chat-utils/loaders/event modules to shared surfaces and prune duplicates.

title: Web cleanup: split use-gateway into transport, rpc, and subscriptions modules
description: Refactor web gateway hook into smaller modules after shared-client migration to reduce coupling and request-loop regressions.

title: Web cleanup: split use-chat into state slices and typed mappers
description: Break monolithic chat hook into thread-list, thread-detail, composer, and event reducer slices with shared typed mappers.

title: Web cleanup: remove deprecated protocol glue and dead chat UI paths
description: Delete obsolete request wrappers, duplicate serializers, and unused UI branches after shared-client adoption.

title: Integrate shared client into mobile runtime
description: Wire mobile app to use shared transport/chat modules and expose RN adapters for connectivity and app lifecycle.
notes: Mobile now depends on @homie/shared (file package) and includes gateway adapter at src/apps/mobile/lib/gateway-client.ts; mobile typecheck passes. Remaining: wire adapter into chat runtime screens/hooks.
close_reason: mobile shared client integration + target OOBE complete

title: Implement chat thread list/detail + streaming turn rendering on RN
description: Render chat threads, open thread detail, subscribe to chat.* events, and stream assistant/tool/reasoning updates with web-equivalent UX semantics.
notes: Thread list + approval action slices landed. Remaining for 8di.3: richer markdown/tool rendering parity and timeline perf/a11y pass (8di.3.2/8di.3.3/8di.3.4).

title: RN thread list screen + query state
description: Implement thread list fetching, sorting by last activity, pull-to-refresh, and empty/error states.
notes: Implemented in mobile chat tab + drawer list: threaded list rendering, sort/update by activity, refresh CTA, and empty/loading/error states. Files: src/apps/mobile/components/chat/ThreadList.tsx and src/apps/mobile/app/(tabs)/index.tsx.

title: RN thread detail timeline rendering
description: Render user/assistant/tool/reasoning blocks with markdown support and consistent spacing/theming.

title: Streaming reducer + scroll pinning behavior
description: Apply incremental stream events, preserve scroll pinning near bottom, and avoid full re-render on each delta.

title: Chat timeline performance + accessibility pass
description: Optimize render batching/virtualization thresholds and ensure screen-reader-friendly message semantics.

title: Build mobile app shell and gateway connection lifecycle
description: Implement RN navigation (chat-first), gateway target selection, connect/disconnect status, and reconnect handling equivalent to web behavior.
notes: Mobile shell + gateway target OOBE + connect/reconnect status landed. Remaining blocker tracked in remotely-8di.4.1 (WS decode spam for non-UUID request IDs seen in mixed web/mobile sessions).

title: Fix WS decode spam for non-UUID request ids in mixed web/mobile sessions
description: Gateway logs repeated 'failed to decode message: UUID parsing failed ... found r at 1' when web and mobile clients are both connected. Confirm emitting client payloads, normalize request-id handling in decode path, and keep protocol compatibility with legacy/non-uuid request IDs.
acceptance_criteria: No repeated decode warnings during normal web+mobile usage; RPC functionality unchanged; regression test added in core connection decode path.

title: Implement RN composer parity: settings, tools list, approvals, queued inject
description: Port composer controls (model, effort, collaboration mode, permission), chat.tools.list display, approval prompts/actions, and mid-turn queued inject behavior.
notes: Approval UI/action slice complete (8di.5.3). Remaining: composer controls parity (8di.5.1/8di.5.2/8di.5.4) and tools inventory rendering (8di.5.5).

title: Composer core input + send/stop actions
description: Implement multiline composer, send, stop, disabled/loading states, and keyboard-safe layout.

title: Composer settings controls parity
description: Model, reasoning effort, collaboration mode, and permission level controls with per-thread persistence semantics.

title: Approval UI + actions on mobile
description: Render approval-required cards/sheets and wire approve/deny/always actions.
notes: Implemented mobile approval cards with gateway actions (accept/accept_for_session/decline), optimistic status updates, and rollback on failure. Files: src/apps/mobile/components/chat/ChatTimeline.tsx, src/apps/mobile/hooks/useGatewayChat.ts, src/apps/mobile/hooks/gateway-chat-utils.ts.

title: Queued mid-turn inject UX and semantics
description: Support mid-turn queued user message with explicit hint text and apply-on-next-step behavior.

title: Tool inventory and tool-result rendering in chat
description: Call chat.tools.list, surface tool availability, and render tool step results cleanly in timeline.

title: Mobile chat persistence + reconnect semantics parity
description: Match web chat behavior for resume/reconnect, queued inject handling, active-turn indicators, optimistic UI rollback, and local draft persistence across app restarts.

title: Draft persistence across app restarts
description: Persist unsent composer drafts per thread locally and restore on app reopen.

title: Reconnect/resume parity with web
description: Handle app background/foreground and network loss with reconnect/backoff and thread state resume parity.

title: Optimistic updates + rollback correctness
description: Implement optimistic message insert, reconcile server ack/error, and keep active-turn indicators consistent.

title: Terminal on mobile: protocol scaffold and UX placeholder
description: Define RN terminal screen shell and protocol hooks (terminal.*) without renderer. Include navigation entry, capability gating, and explicit not-yet-supported UX state.

title: Add RN live integration tests against gateway chat providers
description: Add env-gated live tests/smoke for RN chat flows: connect, thread list/read, send, stream updates, approvals, tool rendering. Reuse existing live provider test toggles where possible.

title: RN live test harness + env gates
description: Set up env-gated protocol-driven RN live test harness against gateway/providers (no emulator UI requirement) and document required env/startup steps.

title: Live tests: send/stream/tool events
description: Add live tests for thread read/list, message send, streaming deltas, and tool event rendering assertions.

title: Live tests: approvals + reconnect flows
description: Add live tests for approval prompts/actions and reconnect/resume semantics under network interruptions.

title: Terminal renderer implementation plan (post-chat)
description: Research and select cross-platform terminal rendering strategy for RN (WebView xterm baseline vs native bridge), performance constraints, keyboard UX, and parity gaps. Produce implementation plan and acceptance gates.
